languages.text: {n}Едва ли хладная торговка слышит ваши слова утешения. Взгляд ее опустошен... и в то же время полнится яростью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Едва ли ваши хладная торговка слышит ваши слова утешения. Взгляд ее опустошен... и в то же время полнится яростью.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}The Cold Trader seems deaf to your words of comfort. Her eyes are bereft, and yet at the same time, filled with rage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Едва ли хладная торговка слышит ваши слова утешения. Взгляд ее опустошен... и в то же время полнится яростью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Cold Trader seems deaf to your words of comfort. Her eyes are bereft, and yet at the same time, filled with rage.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Cold Trader seems deaf to your words of comfort. Her eyes are bereft, and yet at the same time, filled with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Cold Trader seems deaf to your words of comfort. Her eyes are bereft, and yet at the same time, filled with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Cold Trader seems deaf to your words of comfort. Her eyes are bereft, and yet at the same time, filled with rage.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}闇商人の耳にははあなたの慰めの言葉は届いていないようだ。彼女の目は喪失感と同時に、怒りに満ちてもいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Trader seems deaf to your words of comfort. Her eyes are bereft, and yet at the same time, filled with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}闇商人の耳にははあなたの慰めの言葉は届いていないようだ。彼女の目は喪失感と同時に、怒りに満ちてもいる。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊似乎完全没有听到你的劝慰。她的目光中充满了绝望，也充满了愤怒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Trader seems deaf to your words of comfort. Her eyes are bereft, and yet at the same time, filled with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊似乎完全没有听到你的劝慰。她的目光中充满了绝望，也充满了愤怒。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}La Comerciante Fría hace oídos sordos a tus palabras de apoyo. Sus ojos están desolados y, al mismo tiempo, llenos de rabia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Trader seems deaf to your words of comfort. Her eyes are bereft, and yet at the same time, filled with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La Comerciante Fría hace oídos sordos a tus palabras de apoyo. Sus ojos están desolados y, al mismo tiempo, llenos de rabia.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae ne fait aucun cas de votre tentative de réconfort. Son regard est à la fois perdu et plein de rage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Trader seems deaf to your words of comfort. Her eyes are bereft, and yet at the same time, filled with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae ne fait aucun cas de votre tentative de réconfort. Son regard est à la fois perdu et plein de rage.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Kalthändlerin scheint deine tröstenden Worte nicht zu hören. Ihr Blick ist leer und gleichzeitig voller Zorn.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Trader seems deaf to your words of comfort. Her eyes are bereft, and yet at the same time, filled with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kalthändlerin scheint deine tröstenden Worte nicht zu hören. Ihr Blick ist leer und gleichzeitig voller Zorn.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Soğuk Tacir, onu teskin etme çabana hiç aldırmıyor. Gözleri hem hüzün hem de hiddetle dolu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Trader seems deaf to your words of comfort. Her eyes are bereft, and yet at the same time, filled with rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soğuk Tacir, teskin edişlerine hiç aldırmıyor. Gözleri hem hüzün hem de hiddetle dolu.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
